txt.en:
'I've examined the samples you brought me and discovered a strange substance that I have not seen before.'

Hethuwen hands you a phial filled with a dull, green slimy substance and a note full of hastily written information.

'If you would be so kind, [placeholder], please take this sample and my notes back to Hasta. In this letter I ask him to send you to look formore of this substance. You should try to find the source in order to find a pure, original sample for a more thorough observation. Perhaps then we can get to the bottom of this.

'I am sure Hasta is anxious for news in the Water-works. Make what haste you can, [placeholder]. I fear this is not the laughing matter I suspected it would be.'

Hasta takes the phial and reads the note with rapt attention.\n\n'This is strange indeed! Hethuwen is a very knowledgeable master of lore and learning. If this substance is new to her, as seems to be the case, I am troubled.'
'You must hurry and bring the sample and letter to Hasta in the Water-works at once!'

Hethuwen has examined the contents of the package you brought her and discovered a disturbing substance. Hethuwen has asked that you bring the sample, along with her extensive notes, back to Hasta in the Water-works.

Hasta is at the Rotting Cellar in the Water-works, far to the west from the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nHethuwen has given you a phial of the substance she uncovered during her experiment, along with copious notes. She has asked you to bring these to Hasta in the Water-works.
Return to Hasta with Hethuwen's notes
